title: "Automakers rush to take back their software codes"
excerpt: "A typical new car has about 100 million lines of software code. A computer operating system such as Microsoft Windows, by contrast, has only 50 million. Some industry players expect the amount of code in fully self-driving vehicles to climb as high as 500 million lines."
